title: Network gaming: you have disconnected HELPPPP please
body: Hi, since 2 weeks I have a problem with my game, when start a game the champ select works fine, then the loading screen appear, and this message pop-up: Network gaming, you have disconnected, please check your internet connection and try again, yes I did check my damn internet connection, I also tried the hextech tool, uninstall the game AND be patient and wait 1 week to see if the problem is gone, but its still there:( I saw theres a lot of people with this problem on internet but no answer to the problem, can anyone tell me what to do to fix this please? Sorry for the terrible english :s Je parles aussi Francais si y'en a un qui peut m'aider:)

replies.body: League is always online so connection issues are very common, though it sucks you've been dealing with this for so long.  I'm certain something might be up with your network, and it's blocking you from transitioning to the game server.  See if[ Port Forwarding ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)might help here, as well as a [power cycle ](https://kb.netgear.com/19755/How-to-Power-Cycle-Your-Home-Network?cid=wmt_netgear_organic)of your router.  Let me know if this helps!
